name: Survival 4 (Rafaeell)
description:
A low poly styled, multiplayer local game. Survive against your "friends", e be the one with the power.

Controls:

PC
W / S / A / D - Control player.
X / Y Mouse - Move Camera.
Left Mouse - Attacks.
Alt - Defense (+ attack button - Archer - arrows).
SHIFT - While pressed makes the player run.
ENTER - Interaction with objects.
Q / E / R - Special Abilities.

PS4
Left Analog - Control player.
Right Analog - Move Camera.
R1 - Attacks.
L1 - Defense (+ attack button - Archer - arrows).
L2 - While pressed, the player runs.
X - Interaction with objects.
Square / Triangle / Circle - Special Abilities.
